name: Medieval Sokoban
description:
Once upon a time a warrior didn't want to go to war, so to help his colleagues he wanted to clean their house, but there was something strange!

“ What rooms are these!?
What strange things, trees, walls, bushes and even skeletons! And wait, what is this? Is this a CAR? BUT WHAT IS A CAR??
We are not in the medieval era?

No matter, I’ll clean this!! “

So the warrior wants to help his colleagues with their strange bedrooms. 
Go there and do your part!!! 

Use your brain to push the chest on the button and clean all the items on the floor!
For this, use the arrows to move, ‘’ ESC ‘’ to go back to  menu and ‘’R’’ to restart.

This is my first game, so is not perfect.
Thank you for understanding.

And if you have found any bug you can report it on my twitter:
@yamaru_sz

Secret buttons:
1 to 9 go to specific level;
"T" go to level "test";
"G" break the gate;

Assets - kenney
